TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlParser extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供满足以下条件的方法：用于根据表示持久性控件或模板的标记的字符串来创建 Web 服务器 控件或 接口。

span.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser 类提供了可以通过表示控件或控件模板标记的字符串进行分析，创建发控件或获取的方法。The T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser class provides methods that can create a T:System.Web.UI.Control control or T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface by parsing a string of markup representing a control or control template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取上页使用的控件的 HTML 标记类以及如何使用从该控件进行实例化类。The following code example shows how to get the HTML markup for a control on a page using the class and how to instantiate a control from it using the class. 该示例还演示如何显示从设计器的 Microsoft Windows 对话框。The example also shows how to display Microsoft Windows dialog boxes from a designer. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 根据指定的标记创建控件。

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

param.name: designerHost
param.span: 作为页面的设计器宿主的 实例。

span.span: An instance that is the designer host for the page.
The HTML markup for the control.

summary.span: 使用指定的设计器宿主，根据指定的标记创建控件。

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup using the specified designer host.

returns.span: *controlText* 表示的 ；否则，如果分析器无法生成控件，则为 。

span.span: The that *controlText* represents; otherwise, , if the parser cannot build the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示在 ASP.NET 网页上使用的设计器宿主服务的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得的属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法将引发异常，如果分析器无法生成控件。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建的控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

span.span: A parameter is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示在 ASP.NET 网页上使用的设计器宿主服务的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得的属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法将引发异常，如果分析器无法生成控件。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建的控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示在 ASP.NET 网页上使用的设计器宿主服务的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得的属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法将引发异常，如果分析器无法生成控件从`controlText`参数。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the controls from the `controlText` parameter.

span.span: is .
\- or -
is or an empty string ("").
